column5: Looking to get a custom cover made for the bbq...  don't need anything special, but it's just a huge bbq...  anyone know where i could get one done?  bbq size is 74"Lx27"Wx49"H  I'm thinking the cover to be 86"x40"x52" just square, no tapers, curves etc  must be waterproof, uv resistant etc.. etc... blah blah blah... bbq is stainless and will be left outside year round  any help would be appreciated
There used to be a guy in New hamburg (near K/W) who did custom sewing stuff like that reasonably. I'm not sure if he's still in business but I could check if you're interested.  JF

Hey Goran, I know there use to be a place on Vanismart, which runs parallel with Barton, by Strathearne...I'm sure he's still there.  My dad got his cover for his boat there, so I'm sure doing a bbq wouldn't be an issue.  Sorry, don't remember the name.
Goran, I will give you a contact when I get home.  g

Here is the place that makes the covers for CTC centro series BBQ*. I have one for my 6800 and it's  great. Good waulity material. Hope this helps.  * Manufactured by Mantis Automotive, Sport & Marine Phone #: (905) 332-5511
interested in all suggestions...  bbq aint going outside till we get a cover for it
Goran  We have used St. Thomas Canvas and Awning in the past to make odd size air conditioner covers, etc.  They may be worth a call and they do good work.  Their number is 519-633-4444
Special Touch Marine Upholstery & Canvas  Contact : (905) 385-3409 Address : 209 Brigade Dr Hamilton, ON , L9B2G4   ask for Gunner  G.

I'm pretty sure you can get an off the shelf cover for it, by checking out some of the boutique type BBQ shops. They may not be customized to your Q, but they will have sizes that will properly cover the Q. Look for shops in your area that carry Vermont Castings or Napoleon BBQ's and you should be able to find one. HH

UB, you may also want to give these people a call. Ontario Gas BBQ. May have some on the shelft you can use. The place is truly amazing when it comes to BBQs and supplies, near where Gerritt works (400 and Langstaff)  905 761.8511 or www.BBQs.com

Ended up getting the cover made by Cuvers...  www.cuvers.ca  The Cuver came in yesterday, and it exceeded our expectations!!  very friendly people, great service, quick turn around time and great price!!  if you need a cuver made, definitely try these guys out  I'll post a pic of it soon
Heck with the pic of the cover I want ribs
a man and his BBQ....a love story
